name: Red Ballers
description:
*ATTENTION* If you are having frame drops (the game is jittery), you can choose the "Fastest" graphics settings to potentially fix the problem. The Mac and Linux versions of the game have not been tested.

This is a little physics game that I made where you have to jump around to avoid these red capsules that shoot balls for 90 seconds while smashing into block pillars and walls. There is a fun but challenging minigame that you can do if you wanted a challenge and/or a time killer, where you must texture 50% of all the grey blocks with the texture of the game icon. Using an Xbox controller is highly recommended when playing this game, however you can use the keyboard.
